title: One Piece
author: Eiichiro Oda
description: A young pirate named Monkey D. Luffy and his crew of pirates embark on a quest to find the legendary treasure known as One Piece and become the Pirate King.

title: My Hero Academia
author: Kohei Horikoshi
description: In a world where nearly everyone has superpowers called 'Quirks', a boy without any powers dreams of becoming the greatest hero.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
author: Hiromu Arakawa
description: Two brothers use alchemy to search for the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed experiment left them in tragic states.

title: Dragon Ball
author: Akira Toriyama
description: The adventures of Son Goku from his childhood through adulthood as he trains in martial arts and explores the world in search of the Dragon Balls.

title: Fairy Tail
author: Hiro Mashima
description: A young wizard, Lucy Heartfilia, joins a guild called Fairy Tail and teams up with powerful wizards to tackle various adventures and challenges.

title: JoJoâ€™s Bizarre Adventure
author: Hirohiko Araki
description: The story follows the Joestar family, whose members possess unique powers that they use to fight supernatural threats across generations.

title: Nana
author: Ai Yazawa
description: The lives of two young women named Nana who meet by chance and develop a close friendship as they navigate love and the challenges of adulthood.

title: Naruto
author: Masashi Kishimoto
description: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja with dreams of becoming the strongest ninja and earning the respect of his peers, embarks on a journey to achieve his goals.

title: K-On!
author: Kakifly
description: A group of high school girls form a band and navigate the ups and downs of high school life while balancing their music and friendships.

title: Yotsuba&!
author: Kiyohiko Azuma
description: The daily life and adventures of a young, quirky girl named Yotsuba as she explores the world around her with her unique perspective.

title: Detective Conan
author: Gosho Aoyama
description: A high school detective is transformed into a child after being poisoned and must solve cases while searching for a way to return to his original body.

title: D.Gray-man
author: Katsura Hoshino
description: Set in an alternate 19th century, the series follows Allen Walker, a young exorcist fighting against dark forces known as Akuma and seeking to save humanity.

title: Little Witch Academia
author: Yoh Yoshinari
description: A young girl enrolls in a magical academy with hopes of becoming a great witch, and faces various trials and adventures with her friends.

title: Hinamatsuri
author: Masao Ohtake
description: A yakuza member's life changes when a girl with psychic abilities suddenly appears in his life, leading to comedic and heartfelt moments.

title: Nodame Cantabile
author: Tomoko Ninomiya
description: The story follows a talented but eccentric pianist and a perfectionist conductor as they navigate their careers and personal lives in the world of classical music.
